channel.title: Which day is best to release music?
channel.description: Just curious if you guys had any thoughts as to which day of the week is best to release music?

item.title: Which day is best to release music?
item.dc:creator: anon73773654
item.description:
I typically post in the evenings, on Fridays and Weekends when people are free.

item.title: Which day is best to release music?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Jon Sine also points to Friday, to improve chances of being picked up on Spotify’s ‘New music Friday’ playlist(s), ahead of the weekend’s busiest listening period.

item.source: Which day is best to release music?

item.title: Which day is best to release music?
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Good idea.

Also, the time matters, especially if you live in a region that’s awake when large countries are asleep.

item.title: Which day is best to release music?
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Music is released on Fridays.
It used to be on Tuesdays, hence the name “New Music Tuesday.”
#RIPNewMusicTuesday
